article_title: Croatian police say 5,650 migrants have entered Croatia so far
article_text:
The migrants from the Middle East have changed their Balkan route on Wednesday after Hungary closed its border with Serbia and they turned westwards into Croatia.

"The migrants can be seen entering Croatia around several crossing points," police said.

Croatia is transporting the migrants to reception centers around the capital Zagreb after registering them. It said it could cope with several thousand migrants, but not tens of thousands.

(Reporting by Igor Ilic, editing by Larry King)

article_summary:
The migrants from the Middle East have changed their Balkan route on Wednesday after Hungary closed its border with Serbia and they turned westwards into Croatia.
It said it could cope with several thousand migrants, but not tens of thousands.
Croatia is transporting the migrants to reception centers around the capital Zagreb after registering them.
"The migrants can be seen entering Croatia around several crossing points," police said.
(Reporting by Igor Ilic, editing by Larry King)
